title: DATS consent information schema
description: Information about a consent code. Consent information schema can refer to one or more License object(s) and can be used to annotate DATS.Material, for fine grained control, or DATS.StudyGroup for coarser annotation

identifier.description: The identifier of the consent information.

name.description: The name of the consent information, including a label and ideally an ontology term from resources such as DUO, ADA-M.

abbreviation.description: An abbreviation of the consent information.

description.description: A description of the consent information.

incorporatedIn.description: A list of references to licences/ legal documents used as basis for extracting consent information summary and assigning one or more consent codes.

extraProperties.description: Extra properties that do not fit in the previous specified attributes.
